title: Old Mutual
description: The brand colors for Old Mutual are vibrant and diverse, reflecting a mix of heritage and modern growth. The hues used include green shades like '009677', '50B848', and '8DC63F', symbolizing prosperity and balance. Additionally, a bold accent 'D1133E' is used to represent strength and passion. Information regarding these brand colors is referenced from the Old Mutual brand guidelines, which can be accessed at https://irp.cdn-website.com/47c1bc49/files/uploaded/omea-ci-guide.pdf.
